title: Choctaw (1897) Genesis Portion
title_vernacular: Chahta (1897) Miko Chisus Umat Illapint Iholisso
description: Genesis Portion in Choctaw published in 1897 by the American Bible Society

language.name: Choctaw
language.area: Southeast Oklahoma (McCurtain County), east central Mississippi. Some in Louisiana and Tennessee.
